overview: Uncle Dave Macon, also known as "The Dixie Dewdrop"â€”was an American old-time banjo player, singer, songwriter, and comedian. Known for his chin whiskers, plug hat, gold teeth, and gates-ajar collar, he gained regional fame as a vaudeville performer in the early 1920s before becoming the first star of the Grand Ole Opry in the latter half of the decade.
title: Uncle Dave Macon
